header.title: MARS EYE MINI GIMBAL
header.description: The MARSEye110 is an advanced 2-axis gimbal surveillance system engineered for seamless integration with unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs). Equipped with a high-performance 30x electro-optical (EO) camera, a 3x long-wave infrared (LWIR) camera, and a laser rangefinder, it is the perfect solution for border security, public safety, infrastructure inspection, and environmental monitoring.
